text.description: The displayed content is an array when direction is column and a string when it is row
text.description_zh: 显示的内容，direction为column时要求为数组，	为row时要求为字符串

direction.description: Advertise scrolling mode, row-horizontal scrolling, column-vertical scrolling
direction.description_zh: 通告滚动模式，row-横向滚动，column-竖向滚动

step.description: direction = row, whether to use step scrolling
step.description_zh: direction = row时，是否使用步进形式滚动

icon.description: Whether to display the volume icon on the left
icon.description_zh: 是否显示左侧的音量图标

mode.description: Advertise mode, link - show right arrow, closable - show right close icon
mode.description_zh: 通告模式，link-显示右箭头，closable-显示右侧关闭图标

speed.description: The scrolling speed when scrolling horizontally, i.e., how many px (rpx) scrolls per second, helps to control the constant speed of the text no matter how much it is
speed.description_zh: 水平滚动时的滚动速度，即每秒滚动多少px(rpx)，这有利于控制文字无论多少时，都能有一个恒定的速度

duration.description: The time of rolling a cycle is long, in ms
duration.description_zh: 滚动一个周期的时间长，单位ms

disableTouch.description: Whether to prohibit sliding and switching by hand (currently HX2.6.11, only App 2.5.5+, H5 2.5.5+, Alipay applet, ByteDance applet are supported)
disableTouch.description_zh: 是否禁止用手滑动切换（目前HX2.6.11，只支持App 2.5.5+、H5 2.5.5+、支付宝小程序、字节跳动小程序）

url.description: The page path to which you jumped

events.name: click
events.description: Click on the announcement text to trigger

events.name: close
events.description: Click the turn off icon on the right to trigger
events.description_zh: 点击右侧关闭图标触发
